alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 3:06PM MST until March 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. The period of heaviest snow is expected Tuesday through early Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Additional snow forecast from 2 PM Today to 5 PM Wednesday: Buffalo Pass 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
